short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a visual indicator for different Salesforce environments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that helps users identify their Salesforce environment.
Features:

Visual indicator showing current environment with organization name
Distinct red color schemes for Production environments
Unique colors for different sandbox environments
"S:" prefix for sandboxes, "PRODUCTION:" prefix for production
Updated favicon showing "P" or "S"
Draggable indicator that can be positioned anywhere
Top color bar indicator
Hide/show functionality via close button, Alt+Shift+S, or right-click

Usage:

Automatically activates on Salesforce domains
Shows environment name and organization in top-left corner
Drag to reposition
Toggle visibility using multiple methods
Hover effects for better visibility

Technical Details:

No authentication required
No data collection or storage
Uses URL parsing for environment detection
Compatible with Production and Sandbox environments
Minimal permissions required (activeTab only)

Note: Free, open-source tool for quick Salesforce environment identification.
